forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Memorial Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 62. West wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the city wears a gentle shroud of clouds, a familiar companion in this coastal enclave. The temperature settles around a comfortably cool 53 degrees, while the breeze from the west whispers through the streets, carrying with it the essence of the bay. This evening promises a soft, overcast sky, hinting at the calming embrace of the marine layer that keeps the horizon obscured yet intimate—a typical hallmark of this storied location.

Looking ahead to Memorial Day, the forecast beams with optimism as the sun prepares to emerge with vigor, nudging the temperature up to a pleasant 62 degrees. Anticipating a clear sky, free from the grips of fog, the day holds the promise of warmth tempered by a gentle wind—a perfect setting for outdoor adventures. For those wandering through the city tomorrow, layered clothing will provide comfort, allowing for a transition from the cool morning essence to the inviting warmth of the midday sun. This weekend, take an opportunity to stroll through Golden Gate Park or enjoy a leisurely brunch at a local café, basking in the delightful embrace of the sun as it warms the city, melding its vibrancy with the spirited air.
